item.title: All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies
item.description:
All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies

SYDNEY, Australia - So many adults are spending their days colouring in the lines, pencil companies are struggling to cope with the demand for coloured pencils and felt tip pens. Staedtler , the German company which produces felt tip pens and coloured pencils, has seen significant growth in Australia as adults get obsessed with the mindful trend.

item.title: How A Man's Fitbit Got Him The Medical Care He Needed
item.description:
How A Man's Fitbit Got Him The Medical Care He Needed

On Jan. 5, a man checked into a hospital's emergency room in Camden, New Jersey. Because his heart was beating irregularly, doctors suspected he had atrial fibrillation, the most common type of arrhythmia, which can increase the risk of stroke. But to decide how to treat him, they needed to know exactly how long his heart had been acting up.

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.

item.title: dinnertable: A 20-Seat Speakeasy-Style Restaurant
item.description:
dinnertable: A 20-Seat Speakeasy-Style Restaurant

The sign beside the interior door reads "Press for Food." If you're in front of it, you've just walked through the bustling East Village cocktail bar The Garret East, beyond a curtain, into a petite corridor. A push of the analog button sends a chime to the inside and you're promptly greeted.

item.title: 21 Amazing Treehouse Accommodations | Travel Away
item.description:
21 Amazing Treehouse Accommodations | Travel Away

Take a break from hotels and resorts and get back to nature with one of these amazing treehouse accommodations that combine comfort with the thrill of being immersed in nature. Some of them are rustic cabins built into the canopy of majestic trees, others make for luxurious nature retreats, yet others are true architectural marvels with high-tech interiors and contemporary amenities.

item.title: The Design School's Ultimate Guide to Designing With Backgrounds [With Ready-to-Use Templates]
item.description:
The Design School's Ultimate Guide to Designing With Backgrounds [With Ready-to-Use Templates]

Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as to accomplish a particular purpose. - Charles Eames In order to arrange your design, you need a place to start. Backgrounds are the foundation of your graphics - it helps pave the path to forming a successful composition.
